Education

I’m currently a senior pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the Georgia Institute of Technology, where I specialize in full-stack web development and user interface design. My coursework includes data structures, algorithms, operating systems, and human-computer interaction. I’ve also worked on several hands-on projects involving mobile app development, REST APIs, and cloud integration. Outside of class, I participate in student-led organizations and contribute to open-source software.

Services

I offer a range of web development and UI/UX design services tailored to meet client needs.
